column1: Kata Robata////Kobe Beef Yakiniku Don - the kobe beef was tender
column2: perfect fatty/lean consistency. The rest of the dish was great (rice
column4: super hot peppers I almost choked to death on) was good but the star
column6: was the kobe. It came topped with a runny egg
column7: yuck! had to be removed. But I'll take just the meat next time...and lots of it.
